meanings.definition: A photograph or picture taken with a camera.
meanings.sent1: I have many photos of my family in our photo album.
meanings.sent2: She keeps all her photos in a special box to protect them.
meanings.sent3: The photos from our vacation made us all laugh because we looked so silly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the photo was like a burst of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The photos of the sunset were so vivid, it felt like I was there again.

meanings.definition: The process or art of producing photographs.
meanings.sent1: Learning about photos involves understanding light and composition.
meanings.sent2: The class on photos taught us how to develop film in a darkroom.
meanings.sent3: The photos of the photographer taking photos were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her skill in capturing moments on film was like magic to me.
meanings.sent5: The photos of the cityscape were so clear, it felt like I could step into them.

meanings.sent1: Her photos from different trips filled the entire photo album.
meanings.sent2: The photos on display at the gallery were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The photos of the family reunion were a real crowd-pleaser.
meanings.sent4: The photos in the exhibition told a story without words.
meanings.sent5: The photos of nature in the book were so beautiful, they took my breath away.
